name: Andhrimnir
description:
Andhrimnir, the cook of the gods, is running out of fish for the great feast of the warriors of Valhalla!

He tasks Olaf the fisherman and Gudrun the Valkyrie to catch the fish he needs so the eternal feast can keep going.

Use the arrow keys to make your fishing line move up and down, control the fish as it tries to escape the hook and cut it to pieces once it's on your boat!

Contains a little bit of blood and violence against fish.

Made for Mini Jame Gam #11 as a team with my brother (art and sound design by him, programming and level design by me)

Music:

-A Warrior's Sorrow by Ivan Duch (https://ivanduch.com)

-Discovery by Ivan Duch (https://ivanduch.com)

-Varangian by Ivan Duch (https://ivanduch.com)

-Fight Like Hell by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
